abstract: California Atty Gen Kamala D Harris announces that she will run for Senate seat being vacated by retiring Barbara Boxer; Tom Steyer, fellow Democrat and billionaire environmentalist, says he is also considering Senate bid.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general, Kamala D. Harris, plans to run for the Senate seat opening up with Barbara Boxer’s retirement. Tom Steyer, the billionaire environmentalist, said he was also considering a run.
snippet: The attorney general, Kamala D. Harris, plans to run for the Senate seat opening up with Barbara Boxer’s retirement. Tom Steyer, the billionaire environmentalist, said he was also considering a run.

headline.main: One Democrat Announces While Others Ponder a Race for the Senate in California
headline.seo: Kamala Harris Makes Bid for Barbara Boxer’s Old Seat
headline.print_headline: One Democrat Announces While Others Ponder a Race for the Senate in California
